name: ContactCenter
description: Centered contact section with tag, animated title and description, email signup form, and terms text.

description.example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse varius enim in eros elementum tristique.

termsText.default: By clicking Sign Up you're confirming that you agree with our Terms and Conditions.
termsText.example: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.termsText?: string (default: 'By clicking Sign Up you're confirming that you agree with our Terms and Conditions.')

usageExample:
// Wrap in ThemeProvider
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="text-stagger" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="rounded" background="aurora" cardStyle="glass-elevated" primaryButtonStyle="gradient" secondaryButtonStyle="glass">
  <ContactCenter tag="Newsletter" title="Stay updated with our latest news" description="Subscribe to our newsletter for weekly updates and exclusive content." useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} onSubmit={(email) => console.log(email)} />
</ThemeProvider>
